Victoria Adaobi Obasi (amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1952) bụ osote onye isi nke Mahadum Imo State ugbu a. Ọ si Ogboko na Ideato South Local Government Area nke di Na Imo Steeti Naijiria. N'agbata afọ 2011 na afọ 2013, ọ bụ kọmishọna maka agụmakwụkwọ na steeti Imo.
Victoria Adaobi Obasi bụ nwa nwanyị nke Chief Fred na Ezinne Felicia Nnoham
Obasi malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Holy Rosary, Oguta ma mesịa gaa na Holy Rosary Secondary, Ihioma
Ọ gakwara Alvan Ikoku Federal College of Education, Owerri
Obasi nwetara nzere bachelọ (1984), masters (1985) na doctorate (1989) na Mahadum Hull, England
O mere National Youth Service Corps na Women Training College, Enugu (1980)
Adaobi lụrụ Chief Charles Obasi nke Dim Na Nume na Isu Local Government Area nke Imo Steeti ma mukwazia ụmụ ise.
O meriri Bursary Award for Excellence, Mahadum Hull ugboro atọ n'usoro na 1987,1988 na 1989.
O dego akwụkwọ ise, gụnyere mmejuputa nyocha na-aga n'ihu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Imo Steeti, Naijiria, ma bipụta akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa.

Ọ bụ onye otu ndị ọkachamara na Naijiria dịka Nigeria Academy of Education, Curriculum Organization of Nigeria (CON), na mba ndị ọzọ dịka College of Preceptor England (CPE) na World Council of Curriculum and Instruction (WCCI)
